dal.table
Class PersonLoginTable

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.netspective.sparx.xif.dal.AbstractTable
        |
        +--dal.table.PersonLoginTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Default, Table
public class PersonLoginTable
extends AbstractTable
implements Default

Represents the Person_Login table.

Some relevant facts about this class:

  • It represents the Person_Login in the database.
  • It is a child of the Person table in the database.
  • It has 8 columns, all of which are represented as Column class instances as protected member variables and have public getter methods.
  • Wrappers are provided around the createRow() and createRows() methods to allow typed retrieval of the PersonLoginRow and PersonLoginRows objects.
  • The getPersonLoginBySystemId() method is provided to retrieve a single row by the primary key
  • The getPersonLoginRowsByPersonId() method is provided to retrieve all rows identified by the parent column
  • The deletePersonLoginRowsUsingPersonId() method is provided to delete all rows identified by the parent column
